page.title: 05THE GARDEN CENTRE, COVENTRY.
page.content: He works in the shop until it closes at{6.OOp.m. }The rest of his evening is spent on the irrigation or the paperwork. The garden centre employs 6 full-time and 5 part-time staff.The opening times are{8.3O a.m. - 6 p.m. Monday {till Saturday then Sunday 10.00 a.m to {6.00 p.m. The garden centre stocks fish, ponds, garden accessories and ornaments, tools, pesticides, seeds, compost, and peat. In the greenhouse plants and houseplants are grown.Outside are displayed trees, alpines, herbs, shrubs, roses and bedding plants.The centre also supplies and delivers paving slabs and rockery stones. { It is on the A 428 Rugby Road, {BRANDON, Nr. Coventry.
